content: X-BR Bridle ring with nail Bridle ring with pre-mounted nail for use with powder-actuated tools on tough concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Time-saving solution – bridle ring pre-assembled with baseplate and DX ALH nail, delivered ready to install using powder-actuated tools Safer and higher-productivity method for overhead applications – powder-actuated tools with a compatible pole tool remove the need for lifts and ladders Maximized stick rate – high-performance pre-mounted ALH nail for tough concrete Virtually dust-free solution – no drilling required Applications Support for wires and non-sensitive low voltage cables Support for fire alarm cables Support for metal-clad or armored (type MC/AC) cables ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Suspended systems Material: Carbon steel For use with (tools): DX 2, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 Technical Data | Application | Suspended systems | Material | Carbon steel | For use with (tools) | DX 2, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Base materials | Concrete (very tough), Concrete (tough), Concrete (normal-weight over metal deck) | Approvals (global) | UL | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2229906 - Bridle ring X-BR 1-1/4 ALH27 - Package Size 200 pc - 2229907 - Bridle ring X-BR 2 ALH27 - Package Size 100 pc
